Category: Aquatic form
Type: Fire

Another name it is known by is Salamander. It shoots fire from its tail, not its mouth. [#Legal]

 om Nanother il est connu par Salamander est. Il tire le feu de sa queue, et non sa bouche. [#Legal]

カテゴリー：水生種
属性：火

別名「サラマンダー」と呼ばれているが、火は口からではなく尻尾から出てしまう。[#Legal]

Category: Aquatic form
Type: Fire

Another name it is known by is Salamander. It shoots fire from its tail, not its mouth. [#Legal]
